overview: 20/22 is the story of a young couple who managed to maintain their relationship despite the difference in views on the events of February 24, 2022. A student at the Moscow Faculty of Journalism, Danil, goes as a volunteer to the SVO area. He himself is from Sevastopol, and knows a little more about the neighboring state than his girlfriend Alisa and her friends from the capital. Alice, realizing that she is expecting a child, decides to protect her young man from what she considers a fatal mistake and goes after him to return him. Finding a loved one in an active combat zone is not easy. In a few weeks spent in the Mariupol cauldron, the guys will understand that the world lives not only within the framework of their ideas, and the love of Dani and Alisa will be tested to its strength...
